doc.after: The objectives of a public speaker s presentation can range from simply transmitting information to motivating people to act to simply telling a story Professional public speakers often engage in ongoing training and education to refine their craft This may include seeking guidance to improve their speaking skills such as learning better storytelling techniques for example or learning how to effectively use humor as a communication tool as well as continuous research in their topic area of focus
